title: use:enhance breaks forms that are not method=POST
body:
### Describe the bug

A form with no method (or method=get) cannot have a use:enhance directive. The presence of such a directive causes the form to attempt to submit with a POST, and errors out. 

### Reproduction

https://github.com/arackaf/form-enhance-repro

repro should be self-explanatory - type in the box and hit enter. 

### Logs

```Shell
500
Unexpected token '<', "<!DOCTYPE "... is not valid JSON
SyntaxError: Unexpected token '<', "<!DOCTYPE "... is not valid JSON
    at JSON.parse (<anonymous>)
    at deserialize (http://localhost:5173/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/app/forms.js?v=857c15ff:21:22)
    at HTMLFormElement.handle_submit (http://localhost:5173/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/app/forms.js?v=857c15ff:106:13)
```


### System Info

```Shell
System:
    OS: macOS 13.0.1
    CPU: (16) x64 Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-9980HK CPU @ 2.40GHz
    Memory: 69.51 MB / 16.00 GB
    Shell: 5.8.1 - /bin/zsh
  Binaries:
    Node: 16.11.1 - /usr/local/Cellar/nvm/0.38.0/versions/node/v16.11.1/bin/node
    Yarn: 1.22.17 - /usr/local/Cellar/nvm/0.38.0/versions/node/v16.11.1/bin/yarn
    npm: 8.18.0 - ~/Documents/node_modules/.bin/npm
  Browsers:
    Chrome: 107.0.5304.121
  npmPackages:
    @sveltejs/adapter-auto: next => 1.0.0-next.90 
    @sveltejs/kit: next => 1.0.0-next.570 
    svelte: ^3.53.1 => 3.53.1 
    vite: ^3.2.4 => 3.2.4
```


### Severity

Serious but not the end of the world 

### Additional Information

_No response_
